keyphrase: Breach of trust leads to consequences
summary: When trust is broken by speaking ill of others, it can result in negative repercussions.
Negative actions towards others can lead to similar negative outcomes for oneself.

keyphrase: Lack of empathy due to prior actions
summary: It is difficult to feel sympathy for someone who has previously acted harmfully.
Harmful behavior can invite similar treatment in return.
Speaking negatively about others can damage one's own reputation and relationships.
